attributes.action: Encourage companies to recruit through the NI system
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Companies are currently penalised for employing people by having to pay 8% employers NI for each employee. In the meantime they are expected to know and enforce the myriad of legislation and regulation surrounding employment and to act as unpaid tax collectors. Fines are levied when companies get it wrong.

Instead of penalising, try rewarding - instead of taxing at 8% NI, remove employers NI and let companies retain 2% of employees NI as payment for all the costs associated with employment.

This would immediately create additional employment.

This would be more than paid for through the decrease in benefits paid to the unemployed.
